metadata.title: CVE-2020-35533 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
In LibRaw, an out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists within the "LibRaw::adobe_copy_pixel()" function (libraw\src\decoders\dng.cpp) when reading data from the image file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35533` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.20.2-2ubuntu2
libraw20 - 0.20.2-2ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: darktable package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.

libraw package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.20.2-2ubuntu2').
